# The `FixedBlockInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Per-basic block information that doesn&#39;t depend on the trace through the block.

### InstrCount {#a78836dd7449e76cb6d404ecf3b371778}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::MachineTraceMetrics::FixedBlockInfo::InstrCount = ~0u">
The number of non-trivial instructions in the block.

Doesn&#39;t count PHI and COPY instructions that are likely to be removed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h/#l00131">131</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>.
